data.speaker: Player
data.content: Oh no... Did I actually fall asleep during my first class? Ugh...

data.speaker: Player
data.content: Everyone else is gone... How long was I out?

data.speaker: Player
data.content: They could have woken me up, or at least left the lights on...

data.speaker: Player
data.content: I'm still groggy... Good thing my phone has a flashlight.

data.speaker: Player
data.content: I... I have to get out of here!
